# HassanChef - Professional Culinary Education

> Expert culinary guides, Indian cuisine insights, and professional tools by Executive Sous Chef Mobasir Hassan.

## Site Identity
- **Author:** Mobasir Hassan
- **Profession:** Executive Sous Chef
- **Experience:** 13+ years in luxury hotel kitchens (Radisson Group)
- **Website:** [hassanchef.com](https://www.hassanchef.com)

## Site Purpose
HassanChef provides professional, chef-written culinary education including:
- **Indian Cuisine:** Deep dives into traditional ingredients and spices.
- **Seafood Preparation:** Expert guides on prawns, salmon, and professional cleaning.
- **Nutrition & Math:** Specialized tools for calories and professional food cost calculation.
- **Pro Techniques:** Restaurant-standard cooking adapted for home kitchens.

## Authority & Content Standards
All content is written or reviewed by a working professional chef. Recipes and guides follow commercial kitchen protocols, hygiene standards, and cost-control principles.
